dict.string:
#Desc: Grabs current date and/or time from the command line #Use: cdate <type> <format> #Ex: cdate d l
#Type - Do you want the date (d), time (t) or both (b)? #Format - Do you want long (l) or short (s)?
php -f script.php -- {query} | pbcopy echo "Date/Time is now ready in the clipboard"
Copy current date/time to the pasteboard
